document.title: EiffelStudio preferences for Editor: Introduction
document.paragraph:
Some of the features of the EiffelStudio editor can be customized. This section of the documentation contains the necessary explanations to use the editor preferences. In addition to a description of
10_general_editor_preferences.xml general preferences for the editor, you will find a document about
20_keyboard_shortcuts_preferences.xml user-definable keyboard shortcuts and a preferences for Eiffel specific preferences such as
eiffel\20_syntax_autocomplete\index.xml automatic completion.
